lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Finance Ministries and central banks of the other summit nations -- Japan, West Germany, Britain, France, Italy and Canada -- were informed shortly before the news was announced, Baker told reporters today.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Volcker has foregone potentially million-dollar salaries to a life almost overwhelmingly devoted to public service at pay rates low relative to his financial commitments.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He doesn't care a lot, emotionally, about a third term," Nikko Securities vice-chairman Stephen Alixrod, until last year a top Fed staffer, told Reuters recently.
